thread.section_title: Sheraton Kampala Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Same service as European and USA Starwood hotels
thread.title_full: Same service as European and USA Starwood hotels - Review of Sheraton Kampala Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Momodou S
title: Same service as European and USA Starwood hotels
text:
I am proud to give this review especially after watching The front of office at Sherathon Kampala become so great at making you feel welcome and important all through the stay the buffets scored points too .rooms same quality as any top hotel being a traveller all you ask for in life is the smiles that make you feel at home
Room Tip: I was upgraded to a suite thanks to the Starwood scheme See more room tips
